document.title: RALEIGHLIGHTS PORTFOLIO TEST
instructions: Here is a portfolio containing ads. Please look at them as you would normally when reading a magazine, spending as much or as little time on each of them as you would like.
WHEN RESPONDENT IS FINISHEDTAKE BACK PORTFOLIO AND ASK
Now tell me all the ads you remember seeing or reading. Please give me the complete name of each as you remember it from the ad.
PROse: What other ads do you remember? Any others?
What if anyother) cigarette acs do you remember?
1c.FOR EACH CIGARETTE BRAND NOT MENTIONED IN QUS.1a_OR IbASK
Do you remember seeing an advertisement for --BRAND)
